metadata.title: CVE-2017-15572 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In Redmine before 3.2.6 and 3.3.x before 3.3.3, remote attackers can obtainsensitive information (password reset tokens) by reading a Referer log,because account/lost_password does not use a redirect.

criterions.comment: redmine: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
